testsuite.name: Test Case 1: 7-Day Forecast Generation - Validates Core UC26 Functionality

testcase.name: UC26-REQ-2: System MUST identify weekly cyclical patterns (weekday vs weekend mood differences)
UC26-REQ-1: System MUST generate a complete 7-day mood forecast with daily predictions
UC26-REQ-3: System MUST provide confidence scores for each mood prediction
